identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a reverent yet modern digital sanctuary that bridges ancient scripture with contemporary news.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Blend 'Editorial Print' aesthetics with 'SaaS' functionality.
Emotion First: Every pixel must convey 'Peace' and 'Clarity'.
Content is King: Scripture readability is the highest priority.
Negative Space: Use generous margins to create a meditative reading environment.

rules: Scripture text must always use Crimson Pro with relaxed leading (leading-loose).
Use 'tracking-widest' for small overline labels (e.g., 'DAILY DEVOTIONAL').

hero_texture.usage: Hero backgrounds, section dividers, branding elements

devotional_reading.usage: Daily Devotional section, Landing page feature

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or default Shadcn styling without customization.
Dark Mode First: Design for dark mode as a 'Night Vigil' mode, but ensure Light Mode feels like 'Morning Light'.
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast is high, especially gold text on white backgrounds (use darker gold #B49048 if needed).
Data Test IDs: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
No Transparent Backgrounds: Use blur/scrim for overlays.

The 'News-Scripture Analysis' is the core featureâ€”make it look like a high-end editorial piece. The Bible Reader should be distraction-free.
